inscription:
Recto:

at bottom in black ink: god of gangga (all crossed out)

Beneath in brown ink: Gunga
text: Ganga, the goddess of the sacred Ganges river, sits on her crocodile vehicle. The upside down elephant on her left and Brahmin priest at her right reflects an iconographic convention from contemporaneous advertisements and product labels.
title: Ganga on a Crocodile
